p.p: A subset of SNOMED CT intended for use in the UK, a set of concepts, which represent the the type of section.
Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Standards for the clinical structure and content of patient records subset with subset original id 55061000000137.
The use of this subset is Advisory.

For further information on the use of SNOMED CT subsets in messaging please refer to the “Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains” document located under the Associated Specifications tab.
